channel.title: Decrevi the worlds best bot
channel.description:
i know a guy who has the best program ever and i mean the best!!
its called decrevi. (i didnt make it i take no credit)
this program is like aryan
solves most 42 randoms
does tutorial island
does rune mystries
does alot of skills
u can run as many characters as u like ( dependingthe speed of ur computer)
its not free though - because we dont want a army of runescape autoers

item.title: Decrevi the worlds best bot
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:5, topic:92182”]mmm im on it
first stop google
second stop other rs cheating forums
third stop toilet
fourth stop moparisthebest with my results.

[center]Results[/center]

link
Price: 20-30 pound or 5 million GP, no items, no discounts.
Owner from the looks of things GenoDemoN

[center]Other[/center]

from some of the posts on rscheata and GenoDemoN real msn and the one that is used in the link it looks like a scam so i wouldnt trust it tbh[/quote]

Looks like Nexus pro with a new skin.

Read full topic

item.title: Decrevi the worlds best bot
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

On these forums if you are posting a topic with information about a bot that costs money, either:

  1. Give us a link to the site that has information about it.
  2. Give us a cracked version.
